item.title: Trump will host Armenia and Azerbaijan for a White House peace summit to end decades of conflict
item.description: President Donald Trump will convene a peace summit at the White House with the leaders of Armenia and Azerbaijan

item.title: Fast-growing brush fire forces thousands to evacuate north of Los Angeles
item.description: A fast-growing brush fire is forcing thousands of people to evacuate in a mountainous area north of Los Angeles

item.title: Judge to consider the fate of an agreement on protecting immigrant children in US custody
item.description: A federal judge is set to hear a Trump administration request to end a long-standing policy on protections for immigrant children in federal custody
